abstract: Bankrupt Delphi has revealed the lending group that has agreed to provide close to $7 billion to help the insolvent auto parts maker emerge from court protection.
lead_paragraph: Bankrupt Delphi has revealed the lending group that has agreed to provide close to $7 billion to help the insolvent auto parts maker emerge from court protection.

headline.main: Delphi Gets Exit Financing From Citigroup and JPMorgan
